show.subtitle: Dr. Len and Nurse Vicki discuss various natural and holistic health topics while taking your calls.
show.title: Prescriptions For Health

title: Prescriptions For Health
content:
Cruciferous Vegetables are Linked to Breast Cancer Survival Low Calcium Intake Increases Risk of Kidney Stones. Feces... <!--more--> is a Potent Microbial Organ Vicki’s 20:20 Health Tips: GMO Contamination Allowed in Certified Organic Food Toxic BPA (Bisphenol A) is Allowed in Certified Organic Food Packaging and Can Leach into the Food.
Callers: Cameron (NY): Wheat Grass Discussion and Detoxification Flori (Miami): Breast Cancer Survivor - Discussed Treatment Management Issues Marlin (NJ): Grows Hyssop Donald (GA): Management for Autoimmune Diseases.
Caller has Myasthenia Gravis.
Clarence (Bronx): Digestive Issues caused by Cholecystectomy (Gall Bladder Surgery)
